channel.title: CVE Feed for Axis Communications AB -- AXIS License Plate Verifier
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Axis Communications AB -- AXIS License Plate Verifier

item.title: CVE-2023-21410|2024-10-17T15:38:43.424Z -- axis%20communications%20ab -- axis%20license%20plate%20verifier
item.description: User provided input is not sanitized on the AXIS License Plate Verifier specific “api.cgi” allowing for arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-21409|2024-10-17T15:39:19.382Z -- axis%20communications%20ab -- axis%20license%20plate%20verifier
item.description: Due to insufficient file permissions, unprivileged users could gain access to unencrypted administrator credentials allowing the configuration of the application.

item.title: CVE-2023-21407|2024-10-17T15:44:15.221Z -- axis%20communications%20ab -- axis%20license%20plate%20verifier
item.description: A broken access control was found allowing for privileged escalation of the operator account to gain administrator privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-21408|2024-10-17T15:40:24.846Z -- axis%20communications%20ab -- axis%20license%20plate%20verifier
item.description: Due to insufficient file permissions, unprivileged users could gain access to unencrypted user credentials that are used in the integration interface towards 3rd party systems.

item.title: CVE-2023-21411|2024-10-17T15:37:43.186Z -- axis%20communications%20ab -- axis%20license%20plate%20verifier
item.description: User provided input is not sanitized in the “Settings > Access Control” configuration interface allowing for arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-21412|2024-10-17T15:37:01.347Z -- axis%20communications%20ab -- axis%20license%20plate%20verifier
item.description: User provided input is not sanitized on the AXIS License Plate Verifier specific “search.cgi” allowing for SQL injections.
